title: KITCHEN MAHJONG CLASSIC
description: Find pairs of identical Mahjong tiles in this kitchen-themed Mahjong connect game! Remove all tiles from the field before the time is up to complete a level. The path between two tiles can't have more than three lines or two 90 degree angles. A match gives you a small time bonus, so be quick and use a hint in case you're stuck. Try to finish as many levels as possible to earn a high score!
